Uses of Package
de.eckhartarnold.client

  • Classes in de.eckhartarnold.client used by de.eckhartarnold.client 
    Class and Description
    AttachmentListener
    Listener for the "attachment" events onLoad, onUnload.
    Caption
    Displays the image caption of the currently displayed slide of a Slideshow.
    CaptionOverlay
    Encapsulates a caption in a transparent pop-up window over the image panel.
    ControlPanel
    The control panel of the slide show.
    Debugger
    A very simple "printf"-type debugger.
    ExtendedHtmlSanitizer 
    Filmstrip
    Displays a row of thumbnail images as if on a film strip.
    Filmstrip.IPickImage
    An interface that encapsulates a callback method which is called when the user clicks on an image of the film strip.
    FullScreenLayout
    Implements a "full screen" layout for the slide show.
    GalleryBase 
    GalleryListener
    The Listener interfaces for events of the Gallery object.
    GalleryWidget
    presents the user with a table of thumbnail images that can be clicked by the user.
    I18NConstants
    Class I18NConstants and defines some string constants for the user interface that ought to be language dependent.
    ImageCollectionInfo
    The interface ImageCollectionInfo is for querying the configuration data of the photo album.
    ImageCollectionReader
    Reads the information about the image collection from a number of .json files.
    ImageCollectionReader.ICallback
    This interface defines a call back function that is called with the ImageCollectionReader object as parameter.
    ImageCollectionReader.IMessage
    This interface defines a call back that receives a string message.
    ImagePanel
    Displays a photo on an absolute panel.
    ImagePanel.DisplayListener
    Interface for event listeners of ImagePanel.
    Layout
    Abstract base class for all layout classes for the slide show.
    PanelOverlayBase
    Abstract base class for the control panel overlay classes.
    Presentation
    Common root of the presentation classes.
    ResizeListener
    Interface to be implemented by widgets that will be informed if their parent widget has been resized.
    Slideshow
    Plays a slide show on an ImagePanel.
    SlideshowListener
    Interface for event listeners of class Slideshow.
    SourcesAttachmentEvents
    Indicates that a widget allows adding attachment listeners.
    Thumbnails
    Administers a collection of thumbnail images.
    Tooltip
    A "tool tip" widget.
